## Bee.getPin() method

Get pinning status of chunk with given reference

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPin(reference: Reference | Uint8Array | string, options?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<Pin>;
```

## Exceptions

TypeError if some of the input parameters is not expected type
